llm_res.rule: totalSupply: Returns the total token supply.
llm_res.violation: The totalSupply function adds an arbitrary value of 695 to the total supply, which is not compliant with the standard.

llm_res.rule: decimals: Returns the number of decimals the token uses.
llm_res.violation: The decimals function adds an arbitrary value of 3 to the constant _decimals, which is not compliant with the standard.
